episodes.title: Lorrie Vallow Daybell at it again
episodes.description:
In April 2025, Lori Vallow Daybell, infamously known as the "Doomsday Mom," stands trial in Maricopa County, Arizona, for allegedly conspiring to murder her fourth husband, Charles Vallow, in 2019. This high-profile case has garnered national attention due to its complex intertwining of apocalyptic religious beliefs, multiple homicides, and familial betrayal.

Previously, Lori was convicted in Idaho for the murders of her two youngest children, Joshua "J.J." Vallow and Tylee Ryan, and for conspiring in the death of Chad Daybell's first wife, Tammy Daybell. She is currently serving a life sentence without parole.

episodes.title: Faking your death for love .. with a scammer?
episodes.description:
"He Faked His Death for Love... But Was She Even Real?"

In this jaw-dropping story, we follow the journey of a man who goes to extreme lengths for love: faking his own death to escape his old life and win over his online love interest in Uzbekistan. But as the plot thickens, it seems his mysterious lover may not be who she claims to be. Was it true love, or was he the victim of an elaborate scam? Join us as we unravel the twists and turns of this unbelievable tale!

episodes.title: 2024 was created by lazy writers!
episodes.description: From dramatic twists in global politics to groundbreaking tech innovations and bizarre events that defy belief, 2024 is shaping up like the plot of a blockbuster movie. Join us as we explore real-life stories that feel like they were ripped straight from Hollywood—unexpected heroes, shocking betrayals, and futuristic realities included. Don't forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell for more updates that keep life stranger than fiction!

episodes.title: What happened to Hannah Kobayashi (our thoughts)
episodes.description:
In this video, we take a closer look at the mysterious case of Hannah Kobayashi, a 30-year-old woman who vanished on November 8, 2024. She was traveling from Hawaii to New York with a stopover in Los Angeles and hasn’t been seen since. We’ll go through the timeline of events, share insights from her family, and discuss possible theories about what might have happened. Was foul play involved? Could there be another explanation? We also discuss her possible connection to the twin flames cult. 

Join us as we unpack this tragic mystery, highlight key developments, and explore ways the community can help bring her home. If you have any information, don’t hesitate to reach out to the authorities. Every piece of information matters.

episodes.title: Spanking Coroners for CLOUT - Cults and True Crime
episodes.description:
Mark Christopher: The Rise and Fall of a Modern-Day Cult Leader

In 2024, Mark Christopher, a self-styled cult leader, shocked the world with a bizarre and sinister plot to kidnap Senior Coroner Lincoln Brookes. Labeling Brookes a "necromancer" for his work with the deceased, Christopher and his followers targeted him as part of their anti-establishment ideology.

Operating under the name "Federal Postal Court" and drawing inspiration from controversial figures like David Wynn Miller, Christopher promoted fringe theories like Quantum Grammar and claimed mystical powers, including the ability to cure diseases. His manipulative tactics preyed on vulnerable individuals, leading them into a movement rooted in conspiracy, pseudoscience, and rebellion against societal norms.

This video dives deep into Christopher’s cult, his radical beliefs, and the dangerous influence of charismatic leaders who exploit the disenfranchised. Explore how his actions and arrest exposed the risks of pseudoscience and anti-democratic ideologies in the modern age.

episodes.title: The Yellow Deli Cafe/Twelve Tribes Cult
episodes.description:
Learn about the Twelve Tribes cult and its origins under Elbert Eugene Spriggs, also known as "Yoneq." Established in 1970s Chattanooga, this fundamentalist group emphasized strict adherence to Biblical teachings and communal living. Spriggs' journey began as a former carnie, leading to his founding of Twelve Tribes as a haven for young post-hippie dropouts, encouraging communal values and austere lifestyles. The group, famous for running “peacemaker buses” and cafes for runaways, faces criticism for alleged authoritarianism and control over members’ lives.

Marshall Fire, Colorado wildfire, Twelve Tribes cult, Elbert Eugene Spriggs, Yoneq, Boulder fire, devastating wildfire, communal living, religious cult, authoritarian cults, cult history, catastrophic wildfires, Colorado history, December 2021 fires, Boulder County, controversial groups, Biblical fundamentalism

episodes.title: The Discord Cult - You have never heard of
episodes.description:
In this eye-opening video, we expose the disturbing rise of online predation through the 764 Network, a dangerous global group of violent predators exploiting popular platforms like Discord, YouTube, Minecraft, and Roblox. This issue has gained increased attention due to the Bradley Chance Cadenhead case in Erath County, Texas, which underscores the urgent need for public awareness and action against these predators. We explore how this network operates in plain sight, its global scale, and the devastating emotional impact it has on victims and their families.

We begin by uncovering what the 764 Network is, including its origins and methods of operation on major platforms. You'll learn about alarming victim statistics and the extensive global reach of this network. We also break down the tactics predators use, such as grooming and extortion, to target children. Shockingly, these criminals often evade detection while benefiting from ads funded by major brands.

In addition, we discuss the dark side of the internet, referencing infamous cases like Elsagate, and how encryption and the dark web are exploited to conceal predatory behavior. Emotional and psychological impacts on victims are also highlighted, alongside current lawsuits and legal investigations into online child exploitation.

We wrap up by sharing practical tips on how to protect your children from these dangers. This includes crucial parental controls, online safety tips, and reporting mechanisms to safeguard your family from online predators.

Share this video to help raise awareness. Together, we can combat the growing threat of online child exploitation. Visit https://www.ic3.gov/Media/Y2023/PSA230912?itid=lk_inline_enhanced-template for more information and resources. Watch, learn, and take action today!

episodes.title: The CULT of Andrew Tate
episodes.description:
Andrew Tate's ideology often centers on the idea of extreme self-sufficiency and a hyper-competitive mindset. He presents success, particularly financial and social dominance, as the ultimate measure of worth. This creates an environment where followers are encouraged to adopt a narrow definition of success, which can lead to coercive control dynamics.

In this context, Tate may cultivate an "us vs. them" mentality, where followers are led to believe that those outside the group—society at large—are enemies or obstacles to their goals. This fosters a sense of loyalty and dependency on Tate's teachings and lifestyle, making it difficult for individuals to question or critique his views.

Coercive control manifests through the normalization of toxic behaviors and the devaluation of emotional vulnerability. Followers might be pressured to conform to Tate's rigid standards of masculinity, which can include rejecting any form of emotional expression deemed weak. This creates an environment where questioning Tate's authority or ideology is discouraged, further entrenching followers in the cult-like mindset.

As followers seek validation and acceptance within this framework, they may increasingly isolate themselves from external influences, reinforcing their commitment to Tate's worldview. This cycle of dependency and control can make it challenging for individuals to break free from the influence of such a movement, even if they begin to recognize its detrimental aspects.

episodes.title: From McDonald's Manager to 'Mother God': The Shocking Story of Amy Carlson & Love Has Won
episodes.description:
Discover the unbelievable rise of Amy Carlson, a woman who transformed from an ordinary McDonald's manager to the leader of the Love Has Won cult. Known to her followers as "Mother God," Carlson's reign over Love Has Won was marked by authoritarian control, extreme devotion, and delusions of divine power. In this video, we dive deep into the manipulative tactics that defined this cult—abusive practices, sleep deprivation, food restrictions, and emotional control.

Carlson claimed to be the reincarnation of figures like Jesus, Cleopatra, and Joan of Arc, all while leading her followers into a belief system centered on New Age spirituality, apocalyptic warnings, and extraterrestrial guidance. With followers who believed in her alleged "ascension" to a higher dimension, Amy Carlson's death in 2021 left her group facing legal issues and public scrutiny.

Stay tuned as we uncover the darkest secrets of Love Has Won, the shocking details of Carlson’s spiritual delusions, and the eerie practices that held her followers in thrall. Explore the bizarre journey that took Amy Carlson from an ordinary life to becoming a self-proclaimed deity, and learn how this New Age cult drew people into its extreme, destructive beliefs.

#LoveHasWon #MotherGod #AmyCarlson #Cults #TrueCrime #NewAgeCults #MindControl #SpiritualDelusions #CultLeaders #5DShift #CultsExposed

episodes.title: The Moment Andrew Cohen Realized He built a Cult
episodes.description:
In this compelling video, we delve into the dramatic journey of Andrew Cohen, a former spiritual teacher whose rise and fall present both fascination and caution. From his ordinary beginnings in New York City to his dramatic shift into spiritual leadership, Cohen’s story is a profound exploration of ambition and downfall.
Andrew Cohen's Ordinary World began with a typical upbringing in a Jewish family in New York City, where he led a conventional life focused on material pursuits. The turning point came when Cohen felt dissatisfied with his life and sought deeper meaning. This search led him to Eastern philosophies and a transformative journey to India, where he met his pivotal mentor, H.W.L. Poonja (Papaji), who played a crucial role in his spiritual awakening.
Despite his eventual embrace of the spiritual path, Cohen faced significant internal resistance. His transition from a seeker to a spiritual teacher involved challenges, including public scrutiny and the demands of his new role. Under Papaji's guidance, Cohen experienced a profound awakening, which marked the beginning of his mission to teach and lead others.
Cohen’s journey included founding his community, EnlightenNext, and facing numerous tests, including criticism and controversy over his leadership style. His leadership, which became increasingly authoritarian, drew both dedicated followers and harsh critics. This period of expansion was marked by growing tension and challenges within the community.
The collapse of EnlightenNext and Cohen’s public resignation in 2013 were pivotal moments. As controversies mounted, Cohen took time away from public life for deep reflection, confronting the consequences of his leadership and the cult-like characteristics that had emerged.
After several years of introspection, Cohen returned to the spiritual arena with a renewed sense of humility and a more nuanced approach. His teachings now incorporate insights gained from his past mistakes, focusing on the collective evolution of humanity's consciousness and responsible leadership.
Additionally, the video covers the lesser-known aspect of Cohen’s story: the role of his mother, Luna Tarlo, who became one of his most vocal critics. Her memoir, "Mother of God," offers a deeply personal perspective on Cohen’s leadership and its impact on followers, adding a unique dimension to the narrative.
Join us as we unravel the complex layers of Andrew Cohen's spiritual journey and the controversial legacy of his teachings.
🔔 Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more in-depth explorations into spiritual leaders and their impact on followers!
#AndrewCohen #EnlightenNext #SpiritualLeadership #CultControversy #EvolutionaryEnlightenment #Cult #SpiritualJourney #SelfReflection #LunaTarlo #SpiritualAwakening

episodes.title: Are Cult Awareness Network (CAN) Actions Justified?
episodes.description:
Was the Cult Awareness Network working as Deprogrammers or Kidnappers?
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeO_7EoE7YEjNoZXUS0oyEw/join

In this eye-opening video, we explore into the controversial practices surrounding the Cult Awareness Network (CAN). Established with the noble intention of helping individuals ensnared by cults, CAN's methods often involved a process known as deprogramming. But what exactly is deprogramming? Is it a legitimate intervention aimed at rescuing individuals from coercive control, or does it cross ethical boundaries into outright kidnapping?

Join us as we explore the history of CAN, from its early days as a resource for families desperate to rescue loved ones from cults to its eventual bankruptcy and acquisition by a group accused of employing aggressive deprogramming tactics. We examine firsthand accounts from former members, families, and critics to provide a balanced perspective on whether deprogramming was a necessary intervention or a violation of human rights.

This video raises critical questions about freedom of belief, the limits of intervention, and the ethics of combating coercive groups. Whether you're interested in psychology, ethics, or simply curious about the complexities of religious and ideological coercion, this video offers a thought-provoking examination of the Cult Awareness Network and its legacy.

Subscribe for more deep dives into controversial topics and hit the notification bell to stay updated on our latest uploads!

episodes.title: Discussing Netflix series, The Program; Cons, Cults & Kidnapping
episodes.description: In this episode of The Redacted Apostate, we delve into the captivating world of Netflix's latest series, "The Program; Cons, Cults & Kidnapping ." This thought-provoking episode confronts the realities of cults, prompting us to reflect on their resonance in contemporary society. As we explore the series, we also draw parallels to the challenges of modern parenting. From the relentless struggles depicted in "The Program" to the broader societal implications, including the recent Crubmly verdict and its potential impact on similar organizations, our conversation navigates through the complexities of parenthood and accountability. Moreover, we address the controversial influence of figures like Andrew Tate on children and the sense of powerlessness many parents feel when raising difficult kids. Ultimately, our discussion underscores the intertwined nature of media representation, parental struggles, and the quest for societal justice. Join us as we dissect these themes and invite you to share your own insights and experiences. Tune in to The Redacted Apostate for a stimulating dialogue on the issues that matter.

episodes.title: Logic vs Emotions - After cult life Making decisions
episodes.description: We'll also tackle the tricky topic of decision-making. Ever wondered how your brain decides? We'll explore decision-making, how to make good decisions after leaving a high control group or cult.  And when it comes to making big life choices, like leaving a cult, it's not just about emotions; logic play a huge role too. So, get ready for an episode packed with stories, insights, and maybe even a few surprises.

episodes.title: Break the chain & liberate your mind.
episodes.description: Welcome to our podcast episode on freeing yourself from indoctrination and learning to think independently. Indoctrination can happen in various environments, including high-control groups, cults, and manipulative relationships. We'll discuss strategies to recognize indoctrination and regain autonomy over your thoughts and beliefs from my own experiences.

episodes.title: Discussion about Jodi Hildebrant and Ruby Franke
episodes.description: Discussion revolving around the Youtube Influencer and her suspected brain washing. Conversation about how I feel like I am the only one with a different opinion on the events. Listen to my controversial thoughts.
